about_the_game:
Explore Even More

The map of Craftia is now 2x bigger. With way more land comes more bosses, loot and weapons.

Bosses

Two new unexpected bosses and they have different reasons to fight. Not of the Galactic Federation or the Nation of Craftia. But of another realm.

Story

A new force is here, L.L is now on the island but don't worry they don't want to fight. You could just leave them to do their thing or fight them.

New Loot

Legendary weapons and be found. Explore new places like big palaces to find the new weapons of legendary scale.
